name: Dinosaur Hunter: Jurassic Jungle
description:
Face fearsome dinosaurs in the Jurassic Jungle where it's kill or be killed.

This epic first person shooter takes you away to a survival settings where you must survive a series of missions to save yourself and others in the Jungle.
Complete the missions and save your friends, or play survival and see if you can survive the longest and kill the most dinosaurs.

EPIC WEAPONS
Every level adds a new weapon all with realistic bullets, reloading and shooting animations.
Defend yourself with machine guns, pistols, crossbows, rockets, bombs, grenades and more.

AWESOME LEVELS
Play until you've killed more dinosaurs than anyone else of follow along the story including helping people escape, setting bombs, night time missions,
find helicopter escape zones, sniper missions and more.
The gameplay becomes harder the more you play and the dinosaurs more aggressive.

SURVIVAL MODE
How long can you survive against the dinosaurs and can you kill more than anyone else? Can you beat the high score list?

REALISTIC DINOSARUS
Dinosaurs become aware of your presence and will attack or hunt you down or even run away. Can you defeat them all?

SUPER GRAPHICS
Immerse yourself in this high quality graphics environment.

FREE TO PLAY
Nothing to purchase, play for free.
